title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
message:
[LIST=1]
[*]- I used the external apple keyboard, but doesn't work.
[*]- I get light on the mouse
[*]- When i get the OS, the mouse move very slow and sometimes doesn't work.
[*]- The logic board don't have any liquid indication.
[*]- The area of U4801 is clean as well
[/LIST][B]J4813 (measurements without keyboard and trackpad):[/B]
[LIST]
[*]Pin 4 = 3.42v
[*]Pin 30 = 3.34v
[/LIST][B]U4801 (measurements without keyboard and trackpad):[/B]
[LIST]
[*]Pin 4 = TPAD_VBUS_EN= 3.34v
[*]Pin 15-16-17-18 (TPs) 0.56v
[*][COLOR=#FF0000]Pin 20 = Up and down 3.2 to 1.0v[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#FF0000]Pin 21 = Up and down 18 to 14v[/COLOR]
[*]Pin 22 = 3.34v
[*]Pin = 49 VDD = 3.34v
[*]Pin = 51 SMC_PME_S4_WAKE_L = 0v
[/LIST]

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
message: Bad trackpad or cable.

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
message:
Update:
I just get a new trackpad/cable/keyboard and still the same thing.
The thing is, if i don't connect the trackpad/keyboard ans try use external mouse, the computer running REALLY slow. I can move the arrow, but like slow motion.
Sometimes when i plug the external mouse, the machine just shutdown.

I check alread U4801:
[LIST]
[*]Pin 20 = Up and down 3.2 to 1.0v
[*]Pin 21 = Up and down 18 to 14v
[/LIST] why i get up and down?

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
message: No way you could have 18-14V on pin 21.......... You are doing something wrong...

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
message: Ok, Will double check and let you know.

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
message:
Yes, you are right.
Pin 21 just move to 0.005 to 0.030V
Pin 20 is crazy up and down

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
message:
Short to ground on:
- Pin 20 = 0.815M
- Pin 21 = 0.836M

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
message:
Pin 49 and 22 i get 3.3V
Trackpad and keyboard connector looks perfect

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
message: What about J4800 connector??? Voltage on Pin 1 and 4?? trackpad connected.......

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
message:
Trackpad 

Pin 1 = 2.5 (disconnected)
             1.4 (Connected)
Pin 4 = 5 (con and disc)

Pin 2-9 = 1v to 3 Loop (disconnected)
                  1.4 (connected)

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
message: Connect trackpad and measure on R4808......

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 - No Track Pad/Keyboard
